It is a matter of opinion you are asking.  Most people who know of/have hea=
rd of Kawakami Gensai the most well known of the hitori, believe him a fict=
ional character made up by someone with an imagination (and a very good one=
 at that).  But then there are the exeptional few who believe he is a true =
person in our history that helped bring the knew era.  The only thing about=
 this person is that there is very few facts that says he was a real person=
 or not.  so its up to you to decide in your own mind was this person real =
or fictional.  My own believes are that this person helped bring the age of=
 the new era,  That he was the best japanese swordsman that there was,  and=
 most importantly I blieve that he is a Real historical character/a real Pe=
rson that was there to experiance the      shed of Japans battlefields.

Ro=
